original_text: The door to the lowest level of rooms on the sides of the temple was on the south side of the temple. Stairs went up to the middle level and to the top level.
korean_text: 중층 골방의 문은 성전 오른쪽에 있는데 나사 모양 층계로 말미암아 하층에서 중층에 오르고 중층에서 셋째 층에 오르게 하였더라

sentences.original_text: The door to the lowest level of rooms
sentences.korean_translation: 가장 낮은 층의 방으로 가는 문은

sentences.original_text: on the sides of the temple
was on the south side of the temple
Stairs went up to the middle level
